name: Blobby's Adventure!
description:
Story

It's your virtual pet Blobby's adventure! Guide him through the virtual world until he reaches the castle in the sky. Defeat the castle boss to win the game. Collect hearts to refill your health.

Controls:

  • Move with the directional keys
  • Jump with the "up" directional key. If the double jump upgrade has been acquired, you can perform a double jump in mid-air. Note: if you fall off a platform, you can't double jump in mid-air.
  • 'Z' key: Shoot a magic bullet
  • 'X' key: Enter a door
  • Hold 'X' key: Move faster (if dash upgrade has been acquired)
